title: Hamza2424
author: Hamza2424
created_time: March 16, 2023, 01:32:08 PMLast edit: March 16, 2023, 07:14:43 PM by Hamza2424
content: Hi dear Community, Hope so you all are doing great, so first of all let me explain my current problem I am using the Firefox browser on Windows 10 and unknowingly it happened to me. I was using the meta mask extension for the regular transactions in my wallet but that meta mask account was created under an already created account and unfortunately I didn't back up my meta mask added account key. Today my Firefox browser updated and when I logged in again to my firefox there was no extension previously I was using. I was directly accessing my wallet from the browser with a password in the extension.  I have a backup of my previous Firefox default profile but I don't have the key to log into meta mask again. This is my biggest mistake I didn't back up my private key as I wasn't expecting this type of mistake from myself but you know luck was not by my side. Well, I tried to recover the data of the previous profile on Mozilla but it didn't work Metamask asked me again to import the account with seed and as I don't have both of these things I can try to find out Seed as it was just a raw wallet I didn't focus much to protect it but I remember when the first time I installed in browser a few months ago I backed-up my key. Now is there any solution to get back extension data and log in to meta mask without a key or seed all I had currently is the Browser backup profile with some bookmarks and extension files data.Well, I know the fault but I was not expecting a loss of extensions data after the update, so as a result now I will put double attention to the newly added account to export their keys. I am not 100% hopeless as still have previous session data and maybe I can find somehow the primary account seed if there is any possibility then please guide me.  Tip of the Dayback up twice your Added account private key. Don't trust the durability of the Extension data. Never Leave for the Next day.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Hamza2424 on March 16, 2023, 01:32:08 PM Now is there any solution to get back extension data and log in to meta mask without a key or seed all I had currently is the Browser backup profile with some bookmarks and extension files data. The possibility of software failure is so high that you take it into account and not consider it a rare occurrence, so I had to keep at least two paper copies.Unfortunately, this information is not useful, otherwise anyone would have claimed that he had obtained those coins.Try System restore point option, as some files may be saved.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: It’s been a long time since I create metamask account but is it possible that you download your .json file of your wallet since this is a requirements before on creating wallet account aside from saving the wallet seed phrase. Anyway there’s no way to recover that if you don’t have the keys. This is just a wild guess but is it possible to revert your computer updates to the time before your firefox update. This way you might restore your firefox with your account still login.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Quote from: Hamza2424 on March 16, 2023, 01:32:08 PMHi dear Community, Hope so you all are doing great, so first of all let me explain my current problem I am using the Firefox browser on Windows 10 and unknowingly it happened to me. I was using the meta mask extension for the regular transactions in my wallet but that meta mask account was created under an already created account and unfortunately I didn't back up my meta mask added account key. Today my Firefox browser updated and when I logged in again to my firefox there was no extension previously I was using. I was directly accessing my wallet from the browser with a password in the extension.  I have a backup of my previous Firefox default profile but I don't have the key to log into meta mask again. This is my biggest mistake I didn't back up my private key as I wasn't expecting this type of mistake from myself but you know luck was not by my side. Well, I tried to recover the data of the previous profile on Mozilla but it didn't work Metamask asked me again to import the account with seed and as I don't have both of these things I can try to find out Seed as it was just a raw wallet I didn't focus much to protect it but I remember when the first time I installed in browser a few months ago I backed-up my key. Now is there any solution to get back extension data and log in to meta mask without a key or seed all I had currently is the Browser backup profile with some bookmarks and extension files data.Well, I know the fault but I was not expecting a loss of extensions data after the update, so as a result now I will put double attention to the newly added account to export their keys. I am not 100% hopeless as still have previous session data and maybe I can find somehow the primary account seed if there is any possibility then please guide me.  Tip of the Dayback up twice your Added account private key. Don't trust the durability of the Extension data. Never Leave for the Next day. But you should have the key while creation of your wallet right no matter on which account you added that wallet so explore all the folders and let's see you got any luck on your side.Backing up twice or thrice or more doesn't help unless we keep the backup in hard copy because the system can corrupt at anytime, possibility of hard disk failure is there so the real advice is keep the seeds or private keys in an offline drive or physically written note.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Try this one if it will work you have the same issue as the topic started but it's not a Metamask one, another one is your Computer restore point but it's unlikely that you can recover your extension data but you can try it try this recommendation first, hopefully, you can get recover your data and update us for those who will also encounter this issue.Lost extensions

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Quote from: Findingnemo on March 16, 2023, 02:56:21 PMBut you should have the key while creating your wallet right no matter on which account you added that wallet so explore all the folders and let's see if you got any luck on your side.Ahhhh after the struggle of 3 hours and with the prayers of dear fellows and Parents I got a way to get back to my account.. I was just trying by my all keys and randomly following the Single Seed method to somehow get back to the account and guess what I got it was really a small hope that saved my valuable funds even if they are small in amount haha.Thanks for your feedback to all members i will lock the thread now and i will post my learnings which i think new members should know if they go through such an incident.
